turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you put in an order at Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you check to see if they have any specials right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It doesn't appear they have any of their specials; those are usually only around the holidays.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I figured. Get me a regular coffee then. I need a pick me up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any cream or milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A splash of almond milk; make sure they don't put too much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will make a note about that. Sugar or any special flavoring?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 splendas and a splash of vanilla, do they have sugar free vanilla?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have both sugar free vanilla and regular vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 splendas and two pumps of sugar free vanilla

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, what's the best pick up location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in Seattle right near Pike's Place

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is 1912 Pike Place; I'm pretty sure thats the original location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's not; that one is down the street, but it's always so busy there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That makes sense. Did you want blonde blend or pike?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pike.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, so one Venti Pike coffee with 2 splenda, splash of sugar free vanilla and a splash of almond cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's all set for pick up at the Starbucks on Pike Place in 15 minutes. The receipt will be emailed to you via your cell phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a bunch! See yah!
